instructions:
Spread apples in a buttered 6 x 10 x 2 inch Pyrex baking dish and pour orange juice over them. In a
separate bowl, combine sugar, flour, spices and salt; cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Add walnuts and
sprinkle mixture over apples. Bake at 375 F for 45 minutes or until apples are tender and topping is crisp.
Serve warm with cream. Makes 6 servings. 
*(Rev. 4/23/95)*
ingredients: 4 cups tart apples, pared and sliced
l/2 cup light brown sugar, packed
name: Apple Crisp With Orange Juice
creator: Barbara Bush
